title: Non English Type Foundries
content:
I think I am aware of most English language type foundries, but I was wondering what foundries in other countries are doing...   
   
I am especially thinking that the french are bound to have loads of foundries and that they are unlikely to be in English.   
   
Thanks   
   
JIM   
===
author: union

comments.content:
I just found the list in the open directory, so no need to respond to this.   
   
Jim
